entry.title: If You're Lost, You Can Look and You Will Find Me
entry.summary:
Author: DaisyBeats

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 73,751Chapters: 14/?Kudos: 269

Summary: Derek left once the Nogitsune had been defeated, needing to get away from that god forsaken town. 18 year old Stiles is just trying to get through the rest of his senior year without killing his 'best friend' Scott... and missing Derek too much.Stiles goes home one day to find a young man sitting on his bed with no idea how he got there."Derek?!"

entry.title: I am the Lorax, I speak for the Trees
entry.summary:
Author: seaweedly

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,139Chapters: 1/6Kudos: 27

Summary: It’s not like Stiles had intended to keep his non-human-ness from the pack. Truely he thought they knew. It’s not like he had been particularly good at hiding the fact that he was the literal guardian of the Beacon Hills forests.— or —The five times Stiles blatantly shows his true power around the pack without them realising it.And the one time they actually talk about the fact Stiles is not exactly human.

entry.title: Subject 42
entry.summary:
Author: Babysterek

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 626Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 5

Summary: Derek Hale is missing, and his pack is starting to worry. He wouldn’t just leave without telling them. Something is wrong.Meanwhile, Stiles Stilinski has been trapped by the Dread Doctors for two years. He doesn’t know who Derek is, and Derek doesn’t know him. But their lives are about to cross in a way neither of them expected.The pack is searching for their alpha. Stiles is just trying to survive. And if the Dread Doctors have their way, neither of them will ever be the same again.

entry.title: Kings of a Purple Sea
entry.summary:
Author: Kca1516

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 80,486Chapters: 13/17Kudos: 321

Summary: Stiles and Derek are rival pirate captains, each trying to get one up on the other in an attempt to rule the seven seas.Derek is leader to the legendary Hale Pack. A ruthless family of werewolves who even the greatest fear.Stiles, The Sea Charmer, has his own cruel reputation - though no one has seen his true face as he hides in silks of dark blue wrappings.When a joint enemy threatens to take both crews out, will Stiles and Derek be able to put aside their differences and work together - or are they forever destined to burn in the water?

entry.summary:

entry.title: The Space Between Us
entry.summary:
Author: milkyway

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,110Chapters: 11/11Kudos: 73

Summary: Derek Hale has spent most of his life keeping people at arm’s length. Stiles Stilinski has spent most of his life ignoring personal space entirely. Somewhere between late-night phone calls, flirty text messages, Virginia Woolf quotes, a weekend getaway and a long walk on the beach, they find a way to meet in the middle.Or:Derek learns how to have things—love, warmth, home—without the fear of losing them. Stiles makes it his life’s mission to ensure Derek is thoroughly overwhelmed by affection. There are hand-holding lessons, aggressive cuddles, an alarming amount of literary analysis, a cooking-induced identity crisis, and way too much texting from work.It’s slow, messy, and absolutely inevitable.

entry.title: The Creator's Game
entry.summary:
Author: Glitter_Lips

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 32,295Chapters: 9/38Kudos: 19

Summary: Alec has been a Beacon Hills resident and a McCall pack member for just over a year, and he’s finally starting to feel comfortable and safe after his near death experience at the hands of Monroe and her hunter army. He doesn’t want to get involved in the war ever again, content to play lacrosse and live his life.But Monroe isn’t finished yet, and she won’t rest until all supernatural people are wiped out for good. Her plans won’t allow Alec to stay uninvolved forever, and his past threatens to catch up with him no matter how badly he had hoped to keep those secrets buried.

entry.title: The Darker Side of the Moon
entry.summary:
Author: am0ra

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,758Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 37

Summary: The pack was his home. His family.Until, suddenly, it wasn’t.No explanations, no goodbyes—just the crushing silence of those Stiles had spent years risking his life for. He doesn’t understand. He tries to move on. He fails.And then, he disappears.Kidnapped. Isolated. Reduced to nothing in the hands of monsters who don’t need claws or fangs to tear him apart. Every day is a battle between pain and despair, every second a fight to hold on, to not break. But even the strongest souls have a limit.When that limit shatters, something inside him awakens. Something that was never meant to exist.Something that might save him.Or destroy him completely.

entry.summary:
Author: YourDarling04

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 14,373Chapters: 8/?Kudos: 102

Summary: It was a Tuesday morning when they got the call.“Hello?”“Hello, is this Jonathan Stilinski?”“Yeah, that's me.”“I'm calling in relation to a Mic-Misz-”"We just call him Stiles. What's he done now?”“Mr. Stilinski… I'm so sorry for your loss.”In which Peter gains a pack and a family, but remember children, nothing good comes for free.

entry.title: Through Another's Eyes
entry.summary:
Author: Kilani

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,599Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 40

Summary: Stiles wakes up in a world that isn’t his—in a body that shouldn’t be his. Familiar faces surround him, yet everything feels wrong. Worst of all? He’s engaged to Derek Hale—a man he’s sure doesn’t like him, let alone want to marry him. With memories that aren’t his own and a past that doesn’t add up, Stiles must unravel the truth before he loses himself completely.

entry.summary:
Author: Killmesoftly_s

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 31,444Chapters: 13/?Kudos: 134

entry.title: Dark Roast Coffee and Skinny Latte
entry.summary:
Author: BloopsieDaisy

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,432Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 44

Summary: Stiles has always been pretty good at giving people the perfect drink. He ran his own coffee shop, so he would probably know a thing or two about that. When he's about to be robbed one night, he meets Derek, the man who saves him. That's when Stiles' life takes an unexpected turn.

  • No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Derek Hale/Stiles Stilinski
  • Derek Hale
  • Stiles Stilinski
  • Scott McCall (Teen Wolf)
  • Alternate Universe - Coffee Shops & Cafés
